alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:56PM CDT until June 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GILLESPIE COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fredericksburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Stonewall, Blumenthal, Luckenbach, Cain City, Eckert, Albert, Willow City, Rocky Hill, LBJ State Park and LBJ National Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
